resources.string: Scan the fingerprint sensor to unlock the vehicle
All vital stats like speed, odometer, gear and fuel show up here.\nTouching it will show up tuning options
Search for locations to bring up live google map of your journey
Do you want to cancel current navigation?
Analysing topography of previous rides and calibrating your vehicle

A motorcycle ecosystem project, first of its kind implemented through interlinked navigation system assisted by neural network that learns the deformities in the generalised mapped road and provides a visualization of the same to all of its users while unifying authentication interface for utmost security
